verses.verse: And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin<s%>, after their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7508>Rephidim<s%>: and there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H7378>chide<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H4325>water<s%> that we may <S%H8354>drink<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Why <S%H7378>chide<s%> ye with me? wherefore do ye <S%H5254>tempt<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> there for <S%H4325>water<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore is this that thou hast <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H1121>children<s%> and our <S%H4735>cattle<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto this <S%H5971>people<s%>? they be <S%H4592>almost<s%> ready to <S%H5619>stone<s%> me.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Go <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> with thee of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and thy <S%H4294>rod<s%>, wherewith thou <S%H5221>smotest<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%>.

Behold, I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee there upon the <S%H6697>rock<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and there shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of it, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4532>Massah<s%>, and <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>, because of the <S%H7379>chiding<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and because they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3426>Is<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us, or not? Massah: that is, Temptation Meribah: that is, Chiding, or, Strife

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, Choose us <S%H977>out<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and go <S%H3318>out<s%>, <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>: to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> I will <S%H5324>stand<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. Joshua: called Jesus

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to him, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> held <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%>: and when he let <S%H5117>down<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%>.

But <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H3515>heavy<s%>; and they <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under him, and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> thereon; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> stayed <S%H8551>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, the one on the one <S%H259>side<s%>, and the other on the other <S%H259>side<s%>; and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H530>steady<s%> until the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2522>discomfited<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> this for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and <S%H7760>rehearse<s%> it in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>: for I will <S%H4229>utterly<s%> put <S%H4229>out<s%> the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H3071>Jehovahnissi<s%>: Jehovahnissi: that is, The LORD my banner

For he <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3027>sworn<s%> <S%H3676><s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%>. Because: or, Because the hand of Amalek is against the throne of the LORD, therefore, etc the LORD hath: Heb. the hand upon the throne of the LORD
